title: Tiny House Builders
overview: Derek Diedricksen doesn't just make Tiny Houses, he creates micro masterpieces out of salvaged materials. Located in some of the world's most beautiful and at times treacherous locations, he prides himself on building the tiniest of structures that make the most of their surroundings. Viewers will follow along as this master miniature craftsman constructs paradise living in just a few hundred square feet.
